required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: State-wide Health Approach to Increase Reach and Effectiveness: Study 2
clinical_study.official_title: Using a State-wide Initiative to Disseminate Effective Behavioral Weight Loss Strategies

collaborator.agency: National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases (NIDDK)

brief_summary.textblock: Behavioral weight loss programs can successfully reduce body weight, but these programs are available to limited numbers of overweight and obese individuals. This project evaluates a unique weight loss approach that combines a self-sustaining weight loss campaign (for outreach) with training in behavioral weight loss strategies and tests the efficacy of adding components designed to enhance accountability and increase motivation for weight loss.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a randomized trial. Participants will be randomly assigned to 1 of 3 treatment arms: (1) Shape Up Rhode Island (a community-based weight loss campaign) plus and Internet-based behavioral weight loss program (SURI+IBWL), (2) SURI + IBWL + optional group sessions (SURI+IBWL+Group), or (3) SURI+IBWL + monetary incentives for submitting self-monitoring information and achieving clinically significant weight loss. The primary outcome is weight loss at 12 weeks.

primary_outcome.measure: Weight change from the initial assessment to the 3-month follow-up assessment measured on a digital scale to the nearest 0.1-kilogram

secondary_outcome.measure: Weight change from the initial assessment to the 6-month assessment measured on a digital scale to the nearest 0.1-kilogram
Weight change from the initial assessment to the 12-month assessment measured on a digital scale to the nearest 0.1-kilogram

arm_group.arm_group_label: Shape Up Rhode Island + Online Weight Loss + Incentives
Shape Up Rhode Island + Online weight loss program
Shape Up Rhode Island + Online weight loss program + groups

intervention.intervention_name: Shape Up Rhode Island + Online weight loss program
intervention.description: Participants assigned to this arm will receive the standard Shape Up Rhode Island statewide intervention and an Internet-based behavioral weight loss program.
intervention.arm_group_label: Shape Up Rhode Island + Online weight loss program

intervention.intervention_name: Shape Up Rhode Island + Online weight loss program + Groups
intervention.description: Participants assigned to this arm will receive the standard Shape Up Rhode Island statewide intervention, an Internet-based behavioral weight loss program, and the option to attend group sessions.
intervention.arm_group_label: Shape Up Rhode Island + Online weight loss program + groups

intervention.intervention_name: Shape Up Rhode Island + Online weight loss + Incentives
intervention.description: Participants assigned to this arm will receive the standard Shape Up Rhode Island statewide intervention, an Internet-based behavioral weight loss program, and monetary incentives for submitting self-monitoring information and for achieving clinically significant weight loss.
intervention.arm_group_label: Shape Up Rhode Island + Online Weight Loss + Incentives

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Body mass index >=25 kg/m2
2. English speaking
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Health problems that make weight loss or unsupervised exercise unsafe
2. Current pregnancy or plan to become pregnant in the next 12 months
3. Planned relocation
4. Previous participation in Shape Up Rhode Island research studies

facility.name: The Miriam Hospital's Weight Control and Diabetes Research Center
